channel.title: SLAM/robustness-of-SLAM on Zettelkasten
channel.description: Recent content in SLAM/robustness-of-SLAM on Zettelkasten

item.title: Kidnapped robot problem
item.description: Source: Wikipedia Lokalisierung Backlinks: Lamarca 2020 DefSLAM Position initially known Then robot is repositioned without knowing it Robot has to be able to realise that the initial successful localisation isn’t valid any more – a new global localisation must be carried out Realise this via unplausible sensor measurements (huge contradiction to prev. measurements) Has to do with the measure of robustness of the localisation method carried out
